input_text.Prompt:
Using the item keywords and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp, 60"

Item keywords:
Lamp Dimensions: 14 x 14 x 9.5-Inch
Officially Licensed Art on Both Sides of Each Polyresin Lamp Shade
Metal Hardware and Chain, Cord Mounted ON/OFF Switch,2 Hanging Chains with Hanging Hardware Measure 53.5-Inch in Length Each
110V Household Outlets, Recommended Bulb Wattage: 60W (Requires 3 Bulbs, Not Included),Three Prong Cord Measures 58-Inch in Length
Overall Dimensions: 14 x 60 x 9.5-Inch

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
This 60” United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp is the perfect addition to any room.

The bright colors and officially licensed artwork will bring attention to any room.  The included metal hardware, chain, and on/off switch make it easy to set up and use.  The overall dimensions of 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches make this lamp an excellent choice for a wide range of uses.

Interesting features include:

- 60W recommended bulb wattage (3 bulbs not included)
- On/off switch
- Metal hardware and chain
- Cord mounted switch
- 110V household outlets
- Three prong cord
- Overall dimensions of 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches

This product is made of polyresin and is officially licensed.

The attention to detail and durability of this lamp makes it an excellent choice for any room in your home or office.  The official United States Army artwork and bright colors will bring interest to any room.  The included metal hardware, chain, and on/off switch make it easy to set up and use.  The overall dimensions of 14 x 60 x 9.5 inches
input_text.Response B: Light up your game room or man cave with the officially licensed United States Army Three Shade Gameroom Lamp. Measuring 14 x 14 x 9.5 inches, this lamp features two officially licensed art designs on both sides of each polyresin lamp shade. Three prong cord with an ON/OFF switch, 2 hanging chains with hanging hardware that measure 53.5 inches in length each, and a two-light metal base with a cord make this lamp easy to display and operate. Simply plug it in to a 110V household outlet and enjoy up to 60 watts of light. Requires 3 bulbs, not included.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
